properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO , RP.RESERVATION_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.TICKET_NUM , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.PAYMENT_TYPE , RP.PAYMENT_STATUS , RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE USER_NO = ? )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO , RP.RESERVATION_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.TICKET_NUM , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.PAYMENT_TYPE , RP.PAYMENT_STATUS , RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE USER_NO = ? )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO , RP.RESERVATION_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.PAYMENT_TYPE , RP.PAYMENT_STATUS , RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE RP.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO , RP.RESERVATION_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.TICKET_NUM , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.PAYMENT_TYPE , RP.PAYMENT_STATUS , RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE RP.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.VIEW_DATE -3 VIEW_DATE_CANCEL , C.PLACE , M.USER_NAME , RP.PAYMENT_DATE , RP.RESERVATION_DATE , RP.PAYMENT_TYPE , RP.PAYMENT_TOTAL , RP.TICKET_NUM , RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON RP.USER_NO = M.USER_NO WHERE RP.TICKET_NO = ? AND RP.USER_NO = ? AND RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.CONTENT_TYPE , RP.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = RP.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON RP.TICKET_NO = R.TICKET_NO WHERE RP.USER_NO = 1 AND RP.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT RP.TICKET_NO , RP.CONTENT_TYPE , RP.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.USER_NO , RP.CONTENT_NO FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = RP.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON RP.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON RP.TICKET_NO = R.TICKET_NO WHERE RP.USER_NO = 1 AND RP.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND RP.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.CONTENT_NO , R.USER_NO FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON RP.TICKET_NO = R.TICKET_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.CONTENT_TYPE= ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.TICKET_NO , R.CONTENT_TYPE , R.VIEW_DATE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.CONTENT_NO , R.USER_NO FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = R.TICKET_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN REVIEW R ON RP.TICKET_NO = R.TICKET_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.CONTENT_TYPE= ? AND R.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND R.PAYMENT_CANCEL = 'N' AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'N' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT C.CONTENT_TYPE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.VIEW_DATE , RP.TICKET_NO , C.CONTENT_NO , RP.USER_NO FROM RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON C.CONTENT_NO = RP.USER_NO WHERE RP.TICKET_NO = ? AND RP.CONTENT_NO = ? AND RP.USER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_NO , REVIEW_POINT , REVIEW_TITLE , REVIEW_CONTENT , USER_NO , CONTENT_NO , TICKET_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEWNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT R.USER_NO , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.USER_NO , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT R.USER_NO , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT R.USER_NO , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TITLE , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_DATE FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REVIEW_NO = M.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO WHERE R.USER_NO = ? AND C.CONTENT_TYPE = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT R.USER_NO , R.REVIEW_NO , C.CONTENT_TYPE , C.CONTENT_TITLE , RP.VIEW_DATE , R.REVIEW_DATE , R.REVIEW_POINT , R.REVIEW_TITLE , R.REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW R INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO INNER JOIN CONTENTS C ON R.CONTENT_NO = C.CONTENT_NO INNER JOIN RESERVATION_PAYMENT RP ON R.TICKET_NO = RP.TICKET_NO WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = ? AND R.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE REVIEW SET REVIEW_POINT = ? , REVIEW_TITLE = ? , REVIEW_CONTENT = ? WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND USER_NO = ? AND REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT B.USER_NO , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B WHERE B.USER_NO = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT B.USER_NO , B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B WHERE B.USER_NO = ? AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) LISTVIEW FROM( SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B WHERE B.USER_NO = ? AND B.BOARD_TYPE = ? )
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_TYPE , B.BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD B WHERE B.USER_NO = ? AND B.BOARD_TYPE = ? )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT USER_NO , BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , LOCATION , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTNET FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TYPE = ? , LOCATION = ? , BOARD_TITLE = ? , BOARD_CONTNET = ? WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
